data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 3,759 believers in Thessaly and Central Greece against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Thessaly and Central Greece, Greece
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Thessaly and Central Greece, Greece.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Thessaly and Central Greece prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Thessaly and Central Greece to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Father, 0.3% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, you gave the church of Thessaly and Central Greece, Greece the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 666,125 people in the state of Thessaly and Central Greece who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 3,759 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Thessaly and Central Greece
location.people_groups_list: Dutch, Arab, Egyptian, Chinese, general, South Asian, Bengali-speaking, Persian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dutch (2,900), Arab, Egyptian (9,100), Chinese, general (19,000), South Asian, Bengali-speaking (11,000), Persian (1,100)
